args.author: sujato
args.pattern: going forth will not be wasted

value.author: sujato
value.pattern: going forth will not be wasted

sn12.22:3.7.pli: ‘Evaṁ no ayaṁ amhākaṁ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā.
sn12.22:3.7.en: ‘In this way our going forth will not be wasted, but will be fruitful and fertile.

mlDocs.title:
Linked Discourses 12.22
3. The Ten Powers
The Ten Powers (2nd)

an7.72:17.2.pli: ‘yesañca mayaṁ paribhuñjāma cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ tesaṁ te kārā mahapphalā bhavissanti mahānisaṁsā, amhākañcevāyaṁ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā’ti.
an7.72:17.2.en: ‘Our use of robes, almsfood, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick shall be of great fruit and benefit for those who offered them. And our going forth will not be wasted, but will be fruitful and fertile.’

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 7.72
7. The Great Chapter
The Simile of the Great Mass of Fire

mn40:2.6.pli: yesañca mayaṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjāma, tesaṁ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mahānisaṁsā, amhākañcevāyaṁ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā’ti.
mn40:2.6.en: Any robes, almsfood, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick that we use will be very fruitful and beneficial for the donor. And our going forth will not be wasted, but will be fruitful and fertile.’

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 40
The Shorter Discourse at Assapura

mn39:2.4.pli: Yesañca mayaṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjāma, tesaṁ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mahānisaṁsā, amhākañcevāyaṁ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā’ti.
mn39:2.4.en: Any robes, almsfood, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick that we use will be very fruitful and beneficial for the donor. And our going forth will not be wasted, but will be fruitful and fertile.’

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 39
The Longer Discourse at Assapura
